Jim Zhu

Computer Engineering Student - University of Waterloo

About Me

I am a 2nd year Computer Engineering student at the University of Waterloo. I am also a technology enthusiast, avid angler, recreational curler, and rhythm game addict. When I'm not fiddling with the latest and greatest technologies, on a lake, on the ice, or sitting at home clicking circles to the beat.

Work Experience

SAP

Software Application Developer - Toronto, Ontario

  • Created a custom Java tool to analyze and debug OData servers
  • Constructed robust Arduino/Raspberry Pi demo boards to facilitate product demos
  • Demos were successfully presented at the Hannover-Messe industrial fair and SAP d-kom

MHS

Software Developer - Toronto, Ontario
